left-forearm-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: X: USP → RSP; Y: Right-hand rule (limits: Olecranon Process → Cubital Fossa); Z: midpoint RSP-USP → LHE; Radial Styloid Process (RSP); Ulnar Styloid Process (USP), Lateral Humerus Epicondyle (LHE), Posterior Elbow (Olecranon Process)

right-forearm-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: X: RSP → USP; Y: Right-hand rule (limits: Olecranon Process → Cubital Fossa); Z: midpoint RSP-USP → LHE; Radial Styloid Process (RSP); Ulnar Styloid Process (USP), Lateral Humerus Epicondyle (LHE), Posterior Elbow (Olecranon Process)
